title: End Semester Examination Schedule
body: The schedule for the upcoming end-semester examinations for all branches has been released. Please check the college website for details.

title: Workshop on Artificial Intelligence
body: A two-day workshop on 'Modern AI and Machine Learning' will be conducted on the 1st and 2nd of October. Limited seats available.

title: Annual Sports Day 'Momentum 25'
body: Registrations for the Annual Sports Day events are now open. The event will take place on the 15th of October. All are welcome.

title: Library Books Return Deadline
body: All students are requested to return their library books by the 30th of September to avoid any late fees.
